gym_esper_030_receptionist_01:
[BD06:0]I see you completed the ESP exercise,
[trnm:0]!
gym_esper_030_receptionist_02: Congratulations! You pass the Gym Test!
gym_esper_030_receptionist_03:
You’ve now earned the right to challenge the
Gym Leader. Best of luck!
gym_esper_030_trainer_01:
You have to report your passing grade to the
lobby staffer to formally finish the Gym Test!\c
Oh, and ESP actually stands for “[clr:6]extrasensory[clr:0]
[clr:6]perception[clr:0].” Tulip made up “Emotional Spectrum\r
Practice” herself. Don’t get that wrong on a test![npcn:24]
gym_esper_030_trainer_02:
I’ll be cheering for you in your battle with Tulip,
new kid![npcn:24]
